title: Woman brings awareness of COVID-19 vaccine side effects
author: KATHERINE KISIEL; KATU Staff
description: PORTLAND, Ore. (KATU) — An Oregon mother says the last seven months have been hell. "I just really felt like I was going to die. I had never had heart issues like this," said Cammy Patterson, an active mother of four. She said she got the second dose of the Pfizer vaccine back in May of 2021. She said not even 24 hours later she started experiencing symptoms. Caption: (KATU) "I was having shortness of breath, heart palpitations. My heart was beating outside my chest," said Patterson.
